userStories.title: Implement Phase 5B: Internal link insertion (Related + See Also rows)
userStories.description:
ERROR LOGGING REQUIREMENTS:
- Log method entry/exit at DEBUG level with parameters (sanitized)
- Log all exceptions with full stack trace and context
- Include entity IDs (project_id, page_id) in all service logs
- Log validation failures with field names and rejected values
- Log state transitions (phase changes) at INFO level
- Add timing logs for operations >1 second

userStories.title: Build ProjectListPage with create button and search
userStories.description:
ERROR LOGGING REQUIREMENTS:
- Implement React Error Boundaries for all route components
- Log caught errors to console with component stack
- Set up global window.onerror and unhandledrejection handlers
- Log API errors with endpoint, status, response body
- Include user action context in error logs
- Set up error reporting service integration point (e.g., Sentry stub)

RAILWAY DEPLOYMENT REQUIREMENTS:
- Build as static assets (npm run build)
- API URL via VITE_API_URL environment variable
- Configure for production build (NODE_ENV=production)
- Can deploy to Railway static hosting or separate service
- Use relative paths or env-configured absolute URLs

userStories.title: Implement WebSocket connection manager
userStories.description:
ERROR LOGGING REQUIREMENTS:
- Log connection open/close with client info
- Log message send/receive at DEBUG level
- Log connection errors and reconnection attempts
- Include connection_id in all WebSocket logs
- Log broadcast failures per-client
- Log heartbeat timeouts at WARNING level

RAILWAY DEPLOYMENT REQUIREMENTS:
- Railway supports WebSocket connections
- Implement heartbeat/ping to keep connections alive
- Handle reconnection gracefully (deploys will disconnect clients)
- Consider fallback to polling for reliability
